Amobeous/Ramhorn:




"NOW!" Amobeous said, boosters in his mood lifting him 5 ft away from 
Plintissa (well, actually 5 ft in 20 minutes).  Transformin to robot, he 
appeared in front of Ramhorn magically.

Ramhorn jumped, startled.  "Where the slag did you come from!?"

"Errr...I don't know..."

"Oh, by Primus, I swear...I'm going to lose my mind..."
